column1: Specifications: "A single-door mechanism that provides complete entry and exit control via connected Access Readers."
(2) AUX terminals for an external siren and automatic door opener
Connect to two UniFi Access readers and one UniFi Protect camera"
"Enclosure material": "Plastic Enclosure with Metal Mount Plate"

"Input terminals": "REX - request to exit
REN - request to enter
REL - remote release
DPS - door position sensor"
"Ambient operating temperature": "0 to 40° C (32 to 104° F)"
